item.description:
Chip-in: http://call4paul.chip...

The Boston Ron Paul Meetup encourages you to contirbute to 'call4paul' in order to contact by recorded phone messages as many of the 1,500,000 registered (Republican, 500,000 and independent, 1,000,000) voters in Massachusetts as possible in these last days before the Feb. 5 primary.

Please donate what you can and spread the word! Winning MA is our goal! Make sure you mark your donation to the 'call4paul' campaign for use in Massachusetts.

http://call4paul.chip...
item.name: MA Primary Phoning 1.5m registered voters
